grokipedia_article.title: Speech
grokipedia_article.summary:
Fact-checked by Grok

2 weeks ago

Speech

Speech is the primary vocal medium through which humans communicate

language

, involving the coordinated physiological processes of

sound

production, articulation, and prosody to convey meaning via spoken words and

sentences

.

It distinguishes itself from

language

by focusing on the motor and acoustic aspects of verbal expression, such as how

sound

s are formed using the vocal tract, rather than the abstract rules of

grammar

and...
